question: Which among the following Indian economist worked as Chief Economist of Asian Development Bank?
explanation: From January 2015 to August 2017, Arvind Panagariya served as the first Vice-Chairman of the NITI Aayog, Government of India in the rank of a Cabinet Minister. Professor Panagariya is a former Chief Economist of the Asian Development Bank and was on the faculty of the Department of Economics at the University of Maryland at College Park from 1978 to 2003.
